Description.Text:
Position Hotel Astor, completely renovated, is characterized by a warm and comfortable atmosphere and it is located in a very quiet area out of traffic. Ten minutes by foot from Bologna Fair, 900 meters far from the Central Station, a fifteen-minutes walk from the historical center, a few minutes from the 5th or 6th exit of the orbital road. Well connected position even by bus, whose stop is just outside the hotel. The location and proximity to the train station and the bus are the ideal destination for tourists who want to visit the city or for those traveling for business purposes.
Restaurant A rich buffet breakfast with fresh pastries, cured ​​meats and cheeses, seasonal fruit, yogurt, juices, delicious cakes. It is served from 7.00 to 10.00.
